MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G64 postcode area of Bishopbriggs. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to  complete repairs to a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:16am on the 14th of April 2021.
